duties_responsibilities.duty: Guide engineering teams during product development to ensure transparent data collection and usage practices.
Design and implement privacy capabilities, patterns, and policies for integration into products.
Use 3rd party commercial tooling for privacy reviews and issue tracking.
Analyze and audit data lifecycle to ensure privacy requirements are met.
Build relationships with technical and compliance teams to deliver privacy-by-design controls.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a similar technical field (Master's preferred)
